node.title: Dimension Themes
node.excerpt: Adds two Minecraft dimension-inspired themes to select inside the settings window

node.title: Stone Theme
node.excerpt: An alternative light mode, with actual light mode now!

node.title: Fruity Themes
node.excerpt: Adds different fruity color themes to select inside the settings window

node.title: Basic Animated Background-Theme
node.excerpt: This theme uses properties never used before to create a really awesome looking animated background to level up your bridge. experience. For Dark Theme users ONLY.

node.title: Lime Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a lime color theme to select inside the settings window

node.title: Modern Themes
node.excerpt: Adds multiple asthetic modern themes to select in File > Preferences > Setting > Apearence!

node.title: Volcanic and Aquatic Themes
node.excerpt: Adds two new volcanic and aquatic color themes to select inside the settings window

node.title: Lush Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a new lush cave-inspired color theme to select inside the settings window.

node.title: Violet Magic
node.excerpt: Adds a nice looking theme to bridge (dark mode only)

node.title: Custom Theme Editor
node.excerpt: Customize your own theme for bridge

node.title: Retrowave
node.excerpt: A sleek and retro-inspired dark theme.
